fields.name: Chainbreaker Shortsword
fields.desc: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you use this weapon to attack or break chains, manacles, or similar metal objects restraining creatures, you have advantage on the attack roll or ability check. In addition, such items have vulnerability to this sword's weapon damage.
